title: Concerto for ads and heads
brief_description: A day in the life of one of Melbourne’s television stations, as filmed off the screen, one frame in every 10 seconds in 1979. A powerful observation of the content of ‘our box in the corner’ 20 years ago. Set to the music of Bach.
